title: LF Top/JG Mains only Diamond + only Serious team looking to participate in OOL
body:
Looking for Jg/Top main to fill the role for the team.

Must be willing to participate in scrims/tournaments.

Diamond + only plat 1 would be considered if player shows potential.

Toxic/Negatives players must not apply.

Aiming to practise and learn with the team and become a better player

Must have 5+ main champions in the role selected.

Must be willing to make time with the team and be available most times if needed.

Add: Sultan ( If interested )
